name: Depot Drop
description:
"Hey, can you check in the back for an XXXXS of this? I asked 3 people already! Aint you ever heard of the customer is always right?"

Journey into the gross, neverending stockroom underneath your crappy retail job. Use bullets and flares to fight off the monsters you find in there! In pure darkness, monsters cant be hurt, so use the lights to lure them!

__________________________

Controls:

-WASD/Arrows to move

-Spacebar to jump

-Left Click for bullets

-Right Click for flares

-Spacebar restarts on death

___________________________

Made in 2 days for Ludum Dare! We went for Deeper and Deeper to mean delving deeper underground, where there becomes less and less light as you progress.

Credit:
Coding: Me (hello)
Art/Animation: BlorengeRhymes (https://twitter.com/BlorengeRhymes )
Music/SFX: Juan Barro ( https://linktr.ee/J.Barro )
